elevator.rmi
Interface InsideButtons

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
Elevator
All Known Implementing Classes:
InsideButtonsImpl
public interface InsideButtons
extends java.rmi.Remote

The remote interface used for adding remote action listeners via RMI interested in processing action events from inside-elevator buttons. A listener class must implement the elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener interface.

The InsideButtons interface is implemented by the proxy class elevator.rmi.implInsideButtonsImpl. A proxy object with the InsideButtonsImpl class is created for adding remote action listeners to the inside buttons of the elevator with a given number.

The getInsideButtons(int elevatorNumber) static method of the elevator.rmi.MakeAll class is invoked to get a remote reference to the InsideButtons object of a given elevator.

The class that is interested in processing action events from inside buttons of the elevator must implement the elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener interface, and it must either extend the java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject class or be exported by the static method java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject.exportObject(Object), as required by the Java RMI. The object created with that class is remotely registered with inside buttons using the addActionListener method of the InsideButtons interface, invoked on the InsideButtonsImpl proxy object via RMI. For example: 

 import java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject;
 import java.awt.event.*
 import elevator.rmi.*;
 ...
 public class MyListener extends UnicastRemoteObject
  implements RemoteActionListener {
     ...
     int elevatorNumber = 3;
     InsideButtons buttons = MakeAll.getInsideButtons(elevatorNumber);
     ...
     buttons.addActionListener((RemoteActionListener)this);
     ...
     public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
      System.out.println(event.getActionCommand());
     }
     ...
 }
It is worth noting that an object with the AllInsideButtons interface allows adding listeners to inside-buttons of all elevators, a group of elevators or one elevator, whereas an object with the InsideButtons class allows adding listeners to inside buttons of only one elevator.

Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
RemoteActionListener, ActionListener, ActionEvent, AllInsideButtons, FloorButtons

Method Summary
 void addActionListener(RemoteActionListener listener)
          Adds an RemoteActionListener to all buttons inside the elevator.
